type: TS LF Trading Bot Warning - Order Size Value Zero Or Negative

definition.text: Even though the bot got the instruction to open this order, it could not be opened because the Size is zero or negative.

paragraphs.text: This is normal behavior, so you do not need to worry about it. The trading bot created this warning to let you know that this happened, so that you may keep track of all the details of the trade should you need to. This page provides information that should help you understand the context of the warning.
Order Size Value Zero Or Negative
The following are the values of variables at the time this warning was created. They might be useful for you to understand what exactly happened.
